verbose_text: Similar amelogenesis impairment of the permanent teeth in patients with HPP has also been described by Bloch-Zupan A.14 Premature loss of primary teeth allowed the authors to diagnose HPP at the early stage during a primary dental examination of a 14-month-old patient and to timely refer the patient for further examination, which confirmed the diagnosis.
evidence:
Bloch-Zupan A.14


Premature loss of primary teeth allowed the authors to diagnose HPP
